response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am extending this chance to own it at a special price tailored to your needs. My offer to you is $900,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and significance of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 900000}
